name: PicoSearch
tag_list: free-search-engine, site-search, search-website, website-search-engine, search, personal-search-engine, search-tool, search-application, search-engine-software, create-search-engine, make-search-engine, site-search-engine, site-search-software, search-hos
overview:
PicoSearch.com is a fully professional Search Hosting service that gives you a Site Search (Search This Site) navigation feature for your website’s visitors.

PicoSearch is easy to install, and offers fast accurate searching with no additional software required. This service is available FREE for popular default settings, or by business-quality subscription services with full layout control and advanced account management features.

PicoSearch levels the playing field for web designers by making high-end services available to non-server owners and beginners alike.

With your own search engine account that you manage over the internet, you can customize the search on your own website or collection of websites. There’s no waiting and no sharing of search services - you get your own search engine, so you control when your search gets updated, enabling you to reindex and refresh whenever your site content changes.

Whether you are offering a search box on one site, or serving as a mini web portal for many web pages, you will help your visitors find what they’re looking for while keeping them on your site. So you will never have to lose a potential customer again!
